title: ‘The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies’ Episode 13 With Cory | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
Johnny welcomes leader of the opposition, Cory, to the podcast to talk about his experiences on ‘The Challenge’ this season and their rivalry over the years (0:30). They discuss Cory’s masterful techniques in stoking the flames between Josh and Fessy (6:45) and his positioning in the house between the vets and the rookies (17:45). Then they dig into Episode 13, including CT’s ridiculous speech in nominations (45:00), Cory’s scorched-earth tactics in the aftermath of nominations (54:55), and his grueling elimination challenge against Logan (57:42).
Host: Johnny Bananas
Guest: Cory Wharton
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Juliet Litman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
